d2_dictionary.object_name: DQL - Product Management - Validate product code for uniqueness
d2_dictionary.title: Returns a list of product codes for PRFs other than the currently-selected PRF using the same product code or alias as the specified product code. Used to validate product codes to ensure they uniquely-identify products in the repository, including products to which the user may not have access.
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences eTMF Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
d2_dictionary.dql: select product_code as name from dm_dbo.product_info_view where (product_code = '$value(product_code)' or product_aliases = '$value(product_code)') and i_chronicle_id != '$value(i_chronicle_id)'
